root.name: Data Jammers: FastForward
root.description: GameplayThis is an abstract racing game with wireframe visuals and a Tron-like "inside the computer" theme and aesthetic. Players race down a multi-laned path while avoiding or destroying red hostile vehicles by using bombs green neutral vehicles as roadblocks or battering rams. Each level is a linear point-A to point-B track, with players scored at the end based on the number of hostile cars destroyed and collectibles picked up.PC System RequirementsRecommended:OS:XP, Vista or Win7Processor:Core 2 Duo or betterMemory:1024 MB RAMGraphics:NVidia GeForce 8 series or betterDirectXÂ®:dx90Hard Drive:128 MB HD spaceSound:16-bit stereo sound
